Bases: object

class to find a good estimate of the parameter positions and uncertainties to run a (full) MCMC on

returns upper and lower bounds on the parameters used in the X2_chain function for MCMC/PSO starting bounds are defined relative to the catalogue level image called in the class Data might be migrated to the param class
